text: %second%Hey %player% the bitcoin crisis is hurting the museum, we need to get more artifacts.
%main%But sir, I don't have any bitcoin to buy them.
%second%Doesn't matter, use the guns you have!!
%main%Here you go sir, I have found something useful
%second%Hmm, looks well enough. But we need more, continue the search.
%main%Will do.
%second%I am the most powerful and wealthy person you will ever meet. I CANNOT BE STOPPED!!
%main%Have you not seen? I am %player% and I have stopped all your goons before. Now hand over the weapon you have!
%second%Hahaha, you think you can win from me?? BRING IT!
%main%Oh it's on!
%second%HEY %player% HAS COME TO VISIT US!
%main%JESUS CHRIST BE PRAISED!
%second%Now go and find me some artifacts
%main%Yes Sir!
%second%Be careful of all this fake news and don't let these illegals take your bitcoins!!
%second%Welcome to my humble shop good sir. I hope I have everything you want.
%main%Show me what you got
%main%Man those were some weird looking mushrooms... Did some lunatic scientist create something?
%main%Really???!! Drones... They are sending drones to kill me!!
%main%That cave looks really dark I don't know if I should go in there
%second%%player% GET IN THERE NOW WE NEED THOSE ARTIFACTS!!
%main% ugh...
%main%Now into a well... hmmm...
%main%I... I can't believe I did it... I defeated Elon Musk..
%second%Hey %player% I don't know what you did but the bitcoin price is rising again!! The museum is saved!!
